goal.en: Machine learning and data analysis have become the core competencies for students of business schools. This course will teach how to use machine learning methods, supplemented by R programming language, to implement statistical inference and forecasting. The course mainly focuses on economic, accounting, and marketing issues, hoping to combine the theories and practices of machine learning methods, and understand the essence of business data science.
goal.ch: 機器學習與數據分析之統計方法已成為現今管院學生所必備的核心能力。本課程將教授如何運用機器學習與數據分析方法，並輔以 R 電腦程式語言撰寫，針對大量結構與非結構資料進行統計推論與預測。課程主要專注於經濟、財會、行銷等數據分析，期能將資料分析的理論與實務結合，並了解機器學習統計方法的應用。
